Add the memberships of a group in the datasource.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Describes the request body of the /indexmembership API call","properties":{"version":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"Version number for document for optimistic concurrency control. If absent or 0 then no version checks are done."},"datasource":{"type":"string","description":"The datasource for which the membership is added"},"membership":{"description":"The membership to be added or updated","type":"object","properties":{"groupName":{"description":"The group for which the membership is specified","type":"string"},"memberUserId":{"description":"If the member is a user, then the email or datasource id for the user","type":"string"},"memberGroupName":{"description":"If the member is a group, then the name of the member group","type":"string"}},"required":["groupName"],"title":"DatasourceMembershipDefinition"}},"required":["datasource","membership"],"title":"IndexMembershipRequest"}}},"required":true,"x-exportParamName":"IndexMembershipRequest"}}
